description:
In order to prove Ryunosuke`s innocence, Mitsuki, Nagi, and Gaku go to negotiate directly with Ryo. Yamato and Tenn attempt to persuade Sumire, but they fail to change her mind. Anesagi anxiously tells Tsumugi and Okazaki that she`s concerned there`s still more to come...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 狂気と破壊のテトラルキア
